import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import DatePicker from 'react-date-picker'; import {api} from "../../api" function Appoinment({props}) { const [form, setForm] = useState({}); var todayDate = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(form); } // useEffect(()=>{ // setForm(obj) // },[]) return ( <>
